home.monthlySales: Money Wey You Sell This Month
home.offlineNotice: You fit make invoice offline. We go sync am when internet show.

profile.title: Make We Start!
profile.subtitle: Tell us about yourself so we fit show you correct tax guide
profile.incomeSource: Where your money dey come from?
profile.annualIncome: How much you dey make for year?
profile.incomeHint: Put how much you dey make for year in Naira
profile.turnoverHint: Put how much your business dey turn over for year
profile.privacyText: This info dey stay for your phone. We dey use am to show you correct tax guide wey fit you.

pit.title: Personal Income Tax (PIT)
pit.subtitle: Make we calculate your tax with Nigeria Tax Act 2025 rates
pit.totalTax: Total Tax Wey You Go Pay
pit.quizQuestion: If you dey make ‚Ç¶3,000,000 for year, wetin be your tax?
pit.incorrectAnswer: No be so. Try the calculator!

vatcit.title: VAT & CIT Awareness
vatcit.subtitle: When these taxes go affect your business
vatcit.vatThresholdDesc: You must register for VAT when your turnover pass ‚Ç¶100,000,000
vatcit.alertAction: Consider to register soon make you stay correct.
vatcit.vatQuizQuestion: When you go register for VAT?
vatcit.citFlowchartDesc: When Company Income Tax go apply?
vatcit.citQuizQuestion: Company wey get ‚Ç¶60M turnover go pay wetin CIT rate?

firs.title: FIRS e-Invoicing Demo
firs.subtitle: See how NRS invoice stamping dey work (na demo)
firs.endpointsDesc: Na fake ones for learn purpose only
firs.penaltiesText: If you no stamp invoice, dem fit fine you up to ‚Ç¶10,000,000 or put you for prison 3 years under Nigeria Tax Act 2025.
firs.whenToUseText: Turn on e-invoicing when your turnover pass ‚Ç¶100,000,000. TaxBridge go help you set am up with real approved provider.

gamification.title: Your Progress
gamification.subtitle: Track achievements and stay motivated
gamification.enableGamificationDesc: Track your progress and get badges
gamification.enableLeaderboardDesc: Compare your tax knowledge with others (nobody go know your name)
gamification.enableRemindersDesc: Get reminder to log invoices and stay correct
gamification.privacyText: All these things na optional. We dey use am to help you learn.
gamification.privacyBullet1: Your data dey stay for your phone
gamification.privacyBullet3: You fit turn off anytime for Settings
gamification.streakDesc: Log at least one invoice everyday to keep your streak. E dey help you build good tax habit!

community.title: Join the Community
community.subtitle: Connect with other small business people wey dey face Nigerian tax
community.referralBenefit: When person join with your code, una both go get 1 free tax consultation (‚Ç¶5,000 value!)
community.enterCodeDesc: Put code wey your friend give you to unlock reward
community.codeApplied: Code don work! You don unlock reward.
community.telegramDesc: Join 2,000+ business people wey dey share tax tips
community.whatsappDesc: Get weekly tax reminder and deadline alert
community.resourcesDesc: Get templates, guides, and tax calendar
community.supportDesc: Ask questions and get help from people wey sabi
community.congratsText: You don complete the tax onboarding. Make we start to create invoices wey follow law!
community.shareMessage: Use code {{code}} when you dey sign up for TaxBridge!
